versions.correctionNotice:
Minor errors were found in the oil and gas reference tables in the series  'Other volume changes'  (JKOE, JKOS). The errors have been corrected. 

Additionally, PARs have been removed from range of total oil and gas reserves and resources (JKOA, JKOB, JKOO, JKOP). This affected data in the bulletin text only and has now been corrected. 

ONS apologises for any inconvenience.
